name: Exploding Marbles Basic
description:
Exploding Marbles Basic

This is a game where you smash into marbles to destroy them.

Controls

W, or ↑,  Move in direction you are pointing
A, or ←, Turn left
D, or →, Turn right
S, or ↓, Brake
+, Add more marbles

Plans

I plan to add more gamification features like score and failure. However, this version will still stay online, for anyone who doesn't like those things. Therefore, this is the basic version, since it's the base game.

Other stuff

Itch.io is kinda broken and is messing up all the colors, so sorry about that, there's nothing I can do. If you want to see the real colors, use the desktop version of itch.io.

Also, the sounds may not load correctly on your browser, and therefore wont play. Again, use the desktop version to hear all the sounds correctly.
